songs.title: La Vie En Rose
songs.lyrics:
[Pre-Chorus]
...
I just wanna drink pink champagne with you
With you

[Chorus]
La vie en rose
I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun
I, I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun

[Verse 2]
Oh
...
I wanna live... just with you
With you, you

[Pre-Chorus]
...
I just wanna drink pink champagne with you
With you

[Chorus]
La vie en rose
I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun
I, I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun

[Bridge]
...

[Chorus]
La vie en rose
I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun
I, I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun
I, I wanna live la vie en rose
Let's... 'til the sun
Let's... 'til the sun
